Chapter:
Semi6
The Semirings package provides a means of encoding and decoding into a format called Semi6, inspired by the graph6 format.
Encoding
a string
The function Semi6String(S) encodes a semiring S into a string in the Semi6 format.
This function takes, a file or filename f, a list of semirings srs, and an optional mode mode. If f is a file, it writes the semirings in srs to the file in Semi6 format. If f is a string, it writes the semirings to a file with the name f in Semi6 format.
mode can be either "w" or "a" (default), which determines the mode in which the file is opened for writing.
Decoding
a list
a list
